name: BOE Technology Group
overview:
BOE Technology Group Co., Ltd is a supplier of display products and solutions. (BOE A Share: 000725; BOE B Share: 200725).

After research development and technology accumulation for years, BOE has boasted core technologies in TFT-LCD field. The number of BOE independent application for new patent reaches more than 500. Currently, BOE has boasted a TFT-LCD G5 production line with 100k monthly capacity in Beijing, a TFT-LCD G8.5 production line on construction with 90k monthly capacity in Beijing, a G4.5 production line with 30k monthly capacity in Chengdu, and a TFT-LCD G6 production line with 90k monthly capacity in Hefei.

acquisitions.source_description: BOE Technology will spend CNY 290 million buying the computer monitor and TV businesses in Taiwan together with a 100% stake in K-Tronics (Suzhou) Technology Co., Ltd.

milestones.description: BOE Attempts LCD Integration with Purchase of JEAN.
milestones.source_description: BOE Attempts LCD Integration with Purchase of JEAN
